select notice_seq.nextval from dual
insert into notice values(#{noticeNo}, #{regEmpNo}, #{title}, #{content}, #{viewCnt}, '1', sysdate, '0', null)
mapper.update: update notice set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where notice_no=#{noticeNo}
update notice set del_yn=1 where notice_no=#{noticeNo}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, board.* from (select * from notice order by notice_no desc) board) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
